text: @SouthernOracle4 Granny was standing with her hands behind her back, closed her eyes, and closed her eyes.

passages.full_quote: <used>Granny was standing with her</used> left arm extended full length in front of her, her hand clamped around the staff

passages.fragment: was standing with her hands behind her back
passages.full_quote: She turned and looked at Nanny, who <used>was standing with her hands behind her back</used> and face turned towards the ceiling with the expression of an angel, although admittedly one who might have met a few demons in her time

passages.fragment: her hands behind her back , closed her eyes , and
passages.full_quote: Esk put <used>her hands behind her back, closed her eyes, and</used> said: "The flowering tops of Greater Peahane, the root pith of Old Man's Trousers, the stems of the Bloodwater Lily, the seedcases of-" "All right"

passages.fragment: closed her eyes , and closed her eyes
passages.full_quote: She <used>closed her eyes, and closed her eyes</used> again- Someone kicked her hard on the foot
